# loadingPolicy

**Instance Property**

A policy that defines when a referenced entity loads.

## Declaration

```swift
var loadingPolicy: ReferenceComponent.LoadingPolicy { get }
```

## Discussion

The default loading policy is [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ReferenceComponent/LoadingPolicy-swift.enum/onDemand].
